short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eye and share interesting things you find on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Eyeing Button allows you to easily share what you enjoy on the internet by instantly posting to MallStand, Twitter, and Facebook with the click of a button! 

All you need to do is integrate your free MallStand account with your Facebook and Twitter accounts. Once you click the Eyeing Button, the page you are on will be posted to your Twitter, Facebook, and MallStand timelines. 

After you have signed up for a MallStand account you can integrate your Facebook and Twitter in your account settings or  click here: https://www.mallstand.com/account/Integrate.

What is MallStand? 
MallStand is the Mall Online, an all encompassing social network for shopping!
